mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine case
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in leather case, F.G Anderson R.2 Roanoke Virginia 2608; set includes: 8 medicine bottles with stoppers: aspirin, morphine atropine, sedative, benzoic acid, dover's, calomel 2 grain, C.C tabs, Curarin 1/4.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Drugs
Medical instruments and apparatus
